MAN.TITLE: subplot
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: divide a graphics window into a matrix of sub-windows

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : an integer with decimal notation mnp

DESCRIPTION.P: subplot(m,n,p) or subplot(mnp) breaks the graphics window into an m-by-n matrix of sub-windows and selects the p-th sub-window for drawing the current plot. The number of a sub-window into the matrices is counted row by row ie the sub-window corresponding to element (i,j) of the matrix has number (i-1)*n + j.

MAN.EXAMPLE: subplot(221) plot2d() subplot(222) plot3d() subplot(2,2,3) param3d() subplot(2,2,4) hist3d()
